title: Inside Ride E-Flex adds 3 dimensions to your Wahoo trainer
content:
Inside Ride, best known for its E-Motion RollersÂ  – an inventive design that allows the rider to hammer on the rollers without fear of falling off. It’s taking that same free-floating design and applying it to smart trainers – Wahoo smart trainers to be precise. Its new E-Flex motion system takes Inside Ride’s Floating Fork […]

author: Jordan Villella
